name: Eight Ghosts In Old Genso
description:
This is a submission page for Touhou Jam 9. A timing exemption was sought by BakaBaku Circle and approved by Jam organizers due to work obligations.

***CONTENT WARNING***
Due to the nature of the source material, some conversations and events surrounding violent death and self-harm could be troublesome for players or viewers. Please play or view in a way which is healthy for you, and make use of any public resources if you are in crisis.

***

M, the last of a group of outsiders who found their way into Gensokyo from the outside, finds themselves contemplating the next step to take. A mysterious figure crosses their path, stirring M into action-- and exposing them to secrets they may not have wanted to know. Can M survive long enough to find out an answer to the questions which plague them?

Based on ZUN's Dolls in Pseudo Paradise, "Eight Ghosts" is a stealth horror RPG adventure inspired by games such as Yomawari and Pocket Mirror.  

This Jam build is a demo of a game which we intend to full publish and is considered in active development. The first level, "Hour #1" will be playable in the Jam build. Work up to "Hour #4" was completed in the period, but will instead be released in a post-Jam update due to unforeseen circumstances,  with more game content and bug fixes included.

We ask for your patience as we build this game up to its full potential and to follow along for updates. Thank you! -- junejijo, on behalf of BakaBaku Circle

CREDITS:

  • junejijo-- Direction, Writing. Character Concept
  • Pedestal-- Programming, Scenario, Level Design
  • Aizakkyu-- Portrait Art, Character Design
  • NM7-- Sprite Art
  • Luuyu-- Writing, Character Advisement
